attributes.additional_details:
People are scared 
Animals are scared dogs injure themselves mentally and physically, birds die of shock and fall from trees, horses bolt 
Makes a mess of the streets 
Irresponsible people who set them off all year round and ridiculous times and nothing you can prepare for when just random people 
The damage to the earth and air quality
attributes.background:
Make all fireworks silent 
Make it so fireworks shows are held by licensed people 
Ban sales to members of public
